#Create function to make degree minutes into degrees INPUT(degree minutes) OUTPUT(degree)
  #Ensure that if the degree is negative that you turn the minute negative aswell.
redefine_degree <- function(degree_minute_decimal) {
  
  # Splitting the string into degree, (minute and decimal minute)
  split_components <- strsplit(degree_minute_decimal, "[Â° ]")[[1]]
  #Extracting degree
  degree <- as.numeric(split_components[1])
  if (degree < 0){
    minute <- as.numeric(split_components[3])
    minute <- -1*minute/60
  }
  else {
    minute <- as.numeric(split_components[3])
    minute <- minute/60
  }
  #Output the results
  degree <- degree + minute
  return (as.numeric(degree))
  
}

change_df_degrees <- function(df){
  
  df$lat <- sapply(df$Latitude, redefine_degree)
  options(digits = 20)
  df$long <- sapply(df$Longitude, redefine_degree)
  options(digits = 20)
  return (df)
  
}


      

      # Inputs: DF with Regions, DF without Regions
      # Output: DF_need_regions now with regions
Find_zooplank_region <- function(df_regions, df_need_region) {
  # Make Lat and Long columns in df_need_region
  df_need_region$Lat <- df_need_region$Latitude
  df_need_region$Lon <- df_need_region$Longitude
  # Convert to a suitable PCS (in this case OSGB)
  df_need_region <- sf::st_as_sf(df_need_region, coords=c('Lon','Lat'), crs=4326)
  df_need_region <- sf::st_transform(df_need_region, crs=27700)
  
  df_regions <- st_as_sf(df_regions, coords=c('long','lat'), crs=4326)
  df_regions <- st_transform(df_regions, crs=27700)
  
  # Extract Voronoi polygons around locations and convert to an sf object
  loc_voronoi <- st_collection_extract(st_voronoi(do.call(c, st_geometry(df_regions))))
  loc_voronoi <- st_sf(loc_voronoi, crs=raster::crs(df_regions))

# Match Voronoi polygons to locations and select that geometry
  df_regions$voronoi <-   loc_voronoi$loc_voronoi[unlist(st_intersects(df_regions, loc_voronoi))]
  st_geometry(df_regions) <- 'voronoi'

# Find which Region each Zooplankton element should belong to
  df_need_region$Region <- df_regions$Region[unlist(st_intersects(df_need_region, df_regions))]

  return (df_need_region)
}

#Will create a df to get the mean values of each location.
GetMeanRegionDF <- function(df) {
  mean_df <- df %>%
                group_by(Region) %>%
                summarise(across(c(lat, long), mean))
  return (mean_df)
}

### Phenology of Risk ###
      #Input: TaxaInput (list), RegionInput (list)  
      #Ouptput: Phenology of Risk Plots in a grid
make_phenologyOR_plots <- function(taxa_list, region_list) {
  plots_phenology_of_risk <- list()
  for (taxa in taxa_list) {
    taxa_specific <- phenology_of_risk_data %>% filter(Taxa == taxa)
    taxa_region_specific <- taxa_specific %>% filter(Region %in% region_list)
    
    plot <- taxa_region_specific %>% ggplot()+
      geom_line(aes(x=MonthName, y=Probability, color=Region, group=interaction(Taxa, Region), alpha=Window), linewidth=1.5)+
      geom_point(aes(x=MonthName, y=Probability, color=Region, group=interaction(Taxa, Region), alpha=Window, size=Percenttot))+
      scale_alpha_manual(values = alphas) +
      guides(scale = TRUE, alpha = FALSE, size = guide_legend(title = "Percent of annual catch")) +
      labs(title = SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa])+
      labs(subtitle = taxa)+
      theme_classic() +ylab("Critical Decline Risk (%)") +xlab("Month") +ylim(0,100)+
      scale_color_manual(values = COLORS) +   guides(color="none", shape="none", size="none")+  
      theme(text = element_text(size = 20))
  
    plots_phenology_of_risk[[taxa]] <- plot
    
  }
  
  patchwork <- wrap_plots(plots_phenology_of_risk, ncol = 3, guides = 'collect')
  return (patchwork)
}


### Single year Prediction Risk plots ###
      #Input: taxaInputs, regionInputs
      #Output: patchwork of plots.
make_1year_risk_plot <- function(taxaInput, regionInput) {
  plots <- list()
  for (taxa in taxaInput) {
    taxa_spec_data <- FishZoopComparison_data %>% filter(Predator == SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa]) %>% filter(Timesteps == 1)  %>% filter(Region %in% regionInput)
    taxa_spec_data$Region<-factor(taxa_spec_data$Region, levels = c("Delta", "Confluence" , "Suisun Bay", "San Pablo Bay"))
    taxa_spec_data$Taxa<-as.factor(taxa_spec_data$Taxa)
    #taxa_spec_data$Taxa <- relevel(taxa_spec_data$Taxa, taxa)
    for (region in unique(taxa_spec_data$Region)) {
      taxa_region_spec_data <- taxa_spec_data %>% filter(Region == region)
      plot <- taxa_region_spec_data%>% ggplot(aes(x=Taxa, y=Probability))+
        geom_point(aes(color=Region), size=3, position = pd)+
        geom_linerange(aes(ymin=Best, ymax=Worst, group=Region, color=Region, linetype=Group),size=1, position = pd)+
        ylab("Key Window Probability")+
        theme_classic()+
        scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(angle = 30))+
        ylim(0,100)+ guides(color="none", shape="none", linetype="none")+
        labs(title = paste0(SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa], ', ', region))+
        ylab("Critical Decline Risk (%)")+
        xlab("Fish and Potential Zoop. Prey")+
        scale_color_manual(values = COLORS)+
        scale_linetype_manual(values = LINES)+  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank()) +
        theme(text = element_text(size = 25))+ theme(plot.title = element_text(size=25)) + geom_vline(xintercept = 1.5, linetype="dotted", 
                                                                                                      color = "black", size=1.5)
    
      plots[[paste0(SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa], ', ', region)]] <- plot
    }
  }
  patchwork <- wrap_plots(plots, ncol = 4, guides = 'collect')
  return (patchwork)
}



### 10 Year Prediction Risk Plots ###
        #Input: Taxas Selected(list), Regions Selected (list)
        #Output: All plots in a grid to show the Region Taxa Pairing graphs for
make_10year_prediction_plot <- function(taxaInput, regionInput) {
  plots <- list()
  for (taxa in taxaInput) {
    taxa_spec_data <-Predict10yrData %>% filter(Predator== SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa]) %>% filter(Region %in% regionInput)
    Predict10yrData$Region <- factor(Predict10yrData$Region, levels = c("Delta", "Confluence" , "Suisun Bay", "San Pablo Bay"))
    taxa_spec_data<-taxa_spec_data %>%
      group_by(Region, Timesteps, Group) %>% unique() %>%
      mutate(Meanprob=mean(Probability))%>% 
      mutate(Meanbest=mean(Best))%>%
      mutate(Meanworst=mean(Worst))

    for (region in unique(taxa_spec_data$Region)) {
      taxa_region_spec_data <- taxa_spec_data %>% filter(Region == region)
      plot <- taxa_region_spec_data %>% ggplot()+
        geom_line(aes(x=Timesteps, y=Meanprob, color=Region, linetype=Group), linewidth=2)+
        geom_ribbon(aes(x=Timesteps, ymin=Meanbest, ymax=Meanworst, fill=Region, group=(interaction(Group, Region))), alpha=0.05, size=2)+
        theme_classic() +ylab("Critical Decline Risk (%)") +xlab("Years From Present") +ylim(0,100) + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1,10,1))+
        theme(text = element_text(size = 25))+
        scale_color_manual(values = COLORS)+
        scale_fill_manual(values = COLORS)+
        scale_linetype_manual(values = LINES)+ theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank()) + theme(plot.title = element_text(size=25)) +
        labs(title = paste0(SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa], ', ', region))+guides(color="none", linetype="none", fill="none")
    
      plots[[paste0(SpeciesNamesSciNorm[taxa], ', ', region)]] <- plot
    }
  }
  patchwork <- wrap_plots(plots, ncol = 4, guides = 'collect')
  return (patchwork)
}

          #Define function to gather fish/zoop data based on marker region
    fish_zoop_data_region_marker <- reactive({

      return(data)
    })
    
              #Define function to gather fish/zoop data based on region box
  metadata_box <- reactive({
    req(input$region)
    
    data <- Station_summary_df_long %>%
      dplyr::filter(
        if ("Select All" %in% input$region) {
          Region %in% Zooplank_station_regions
        } else {
          Region %in% input$region
        }
      )
          # Check if both checkboxes are unchecked or both are checked
      if ((!input$fish && !input$zooplankton) || (input$fish && input$zooplankton)) {
        return(data)  # Return full data in these cases
      }
    
    # Filter by fish and zooplankton input
    if (input$fish) {
      data <- data %>% dplyr::filter(Group == "Fish")
    } else if (input$zooplankton) {
      data <- data %>% dplyr::filter(Group == "Zoop")
    }
    
      return(data)
  })
  
    
  ######                  Create Map                  ######
                       ###Main output Bay Delta Map###
    output$BayDelta <- renderLeaflet({

      )
  })
    
                    #Add Legend before
    observe({

     })
    
                  #Prompt a marker to be selected

        })
    
    output$Station_data <- renderDataTable({fish_zoop_data()})
  

                  #No initial marker/region
  selected_marker <- reactiveVal(NULL)
  selected_region <- reactiveVal(NULL)


  
               #### Observing a Click ####
    observeEvent(c(input$fish, input$zooplankton, input$region, input$basemap, input$BayDelta_marker_click), {
      
    observeEvent(c(input$fish, input$zooplankton, input$region, input$basemap), {

    })
      
      show_fish <- input$fish

      ###Display Graph 2(Predator Prey 10 year) || We will not change df based on input, but rather just the plots to be shown
      #plots_for_plot2 <- plots2[input$Taxa]
      
      
      
      
  ######                  PLOTS                   ######
                  ### Phenology of Risk plot ###
  
  output$plot1 <- make_phenologyOR_plots(input$TaxaInput, input$region)
      
      
      
      
      
      
      ##Display what Taxa Exist in the Given Region upon click on region##
      
      # output$TaxaExist <- renderValueBox({

        ######  Render the station counts Feature #######

    output$countFish <- renderValueBox({
      if (is.null(Filtered_Station_counts())) {

       } else {

      valueBox(total_fish_stations, 
               "Fish Stations",

    output$countZooplankton <- renderValueBox({

      }
      valueBox(total_zooplankton_stations, 
               "Zooplankton Stations", 
               # icon = icon("bug"),

    })
    
    
    # Clear existing markers
    leafletProxy("BayDelta") %>%

    #### Adding events for marker click ####

     #If station is selected, Station Number + Data
    else{
